Gordon,
Your mail server is blocking my address now too, it's not just Ralph:

   SMTP error from remote mailer after RCPT TO:<robsongo@...>:
    host swumg1.swu.ac.jp [202.254.91.90]: 550 <jggilbert@...>:
    Sender address rejected: Blocked

No more sword email to the work account I guess.

Do you have another address?  Maybe a temp account with hotmail or yahoo or whatever until this is sorted out.

Apologies to the rest of the list, but this is in regard to the NTHK display at the SF show, so sword related.

Thanks,
Jim
